name: Electronic Super Joy 2
description:
Electronic Super Joy 2 is a brutally hard platformer, set in a world of brain-smashing electronic music. Run, jump, smash & slice your way through a world of giant monsters, spinning lasers & secret doggos.

Includes the bonus worlds of the Derp Dragon, and The Groove Wizard's Tower, + all the content from the Gold Edition!


- Fight the Derp Dragon with the new ability, Sky Dagger! 

- Climb the Groove Wizard's Tower and face all his brand new weird monsters!

- New in-game music tracks, from the musicians you love!

- Includes full game soundtrack of 43 tracks (OST)

- Bonus EnV Jazz track

- HD digital posters (3 of them!)

- In-development GIFs, screenshots

- Behind the scenes developer sketches

- Behind the scenes developer sketches, in-development GIFs, screenshot & gifs of the indie development dog, Max!
